data.title: The Oldest Living Major Golf Champions
data.meta_description: On Sunday, 29th January, two-time major champion Jack Burke Jr turns 100. Winner of both the Masters and PGA Championship in 1956, theÂ longevity of this World Golf of Fame member got us thinking about the oldest professional major champions alive today, with 24 men and women who etched their name in history currently in their 80s and 90s.
data.text:
On Sunday, 29th January, two-time major champion Jack Burke Jr turns 100. Winner of both the Masters and PGA Championship in 1956, this son of a golf professional has enjoyed a remarkable lifetime through the game, with the Texan playing and twice captaining in the Ryder Cup.

Burke has remained active courtesy of his ownership of the Champions Golf Club in Houston, which hosted the US Women's Open in 2020. More recently, the venue was sold to his son, but the joint-founder has remained chairman, a position he will hold for the remainder of his life.

The longevity of this World Golf of Fame member got us thinking about the oldest professional major champions alive today, with 24 men and women who etched their name in history currently in their 80s and 90s.

(87-Year-Old Gary Player - Image Credit: Kevin Diss Photography)

Jack Burke Jr

Date of Birth: 29/01/1923

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1956 Masters Tournament, 1956 PGA Championship

Betsy Rawls

Date of Birth: 04/05/1928

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: Western Open (1952, 1959), Women's PGA Championship (1959, 1969), US Women's Open (1951, 1953, 1957, 1960)

Don January

Date of Birth: 20/11/1929

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1967 PGA Championship

Kathy Cornelius

Date of Birth: 27/10/1932

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1956 US Women's Open

Joyce Ziske

Date of Birth: 1934

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1960 Western Open

Marlene Hagge

Date of Birth: 16/02/1934

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1956 Women's PGA Championship

Gary Player

Date of Birth: 01/11/1935

Nationality: South Africa

Major Championships Won: Masters Tournament (1961, 1974, 1978), PGA Championship (1962, 1972), 1965 US Open, The Open Championship (1959, 1968, 1974)

Sir Bob Charles

Date of Birth: 14/03/1936

Nationality: New Zealand

Major Championships Won: 1963 Open Championship

Bobby Nichols

Date of Birth: 14/04/1936

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1964 PGA Championship

Tommy Aaron

Date of Birth: 22/03/1937

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1973 Masters Tournament

Charles Coody

Date of Birth: 13/07/1937

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1971 Masters Tournament

Al Geiberger

Date of Birth: 01/09/1937

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1966 PGA Championship

Lou Graham

Date of Birth: 07/01/1938

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1975 US Open

Judy Kimball

Date of Birth: 17/06/1938

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1962 Women's PGA Championship

Murle Breer

Date of Birth: 20/01/1939

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1962 US Women's Open

JoAnne Carner

Date of Birth: 04/04/1939

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: US Women's Open (1971, 1976)

Lee Trevino

Date of Birth: 01/12/1939

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: PGA Championship (1974, 1984), US Open (1968, 1971), The Open Championship (1971, 1972)

Mary Mills

Date of Birth: 19/01/1940

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: Women's PGA Championship (1964, 1973), 1963 US Women's Open

Jack Nicklaus

Date of Birth: 21/01/1940

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: Masters Tournament (1963, 1965, 1966, 1972, 1975, 1986), PGA Championship (1963, 1971, 1973, 1975, 1980), US Open (1962, 1967, 1972, 1980), The Open Championship (1966, 1970, 1978)

Susie Berning

Date of Birth: 22/07/1941

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1965 Western Open, US Women's Open (1968, 1972, 1973)

Gloria Ehret

Date of Birth: 23/08/1941

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1966 Women's PGA Championship

Dave Stockton

Date of Birth: 02/11/1941

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: PGA Championship (1970, 1976)

Raymond Floyd

Date of Birth: 04/09/1942

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1976 Masters Tournament, PGA Championship (1969, 1982), 1986 US Open

Jerilyn Britz

Date of Birth: 01/01/1943

Nationality: United States

Major Championships Won: 1979 US Women's Open
